Detailed Description

cvmx_l2c_rtg::_err

This register records error information for all RTG SBE/DBE errors. The priority of errors (lowest to highest) is SBE, DBE. An error locks [SYN], [WAY], and [L2IDX] fields for equal or lower priority errors until cleared by software. The syndrome is recorded for DBE errors, though the utility of the value is not clear. [L2IDX][19:7] is the L2 block index associated with the command which had no way to allocate.
